TopicTitle: The mighty ascent of the monoprop tank

Articles.Content:
<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/4kmCHBM-tKg?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

I switched from a splashed down vessel to a part that bounced off the water and witnessed it's greatness, breaking free from the pull of gravity.

Oh my.

You should power a ship with that tech ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) Seems like the second coming of the K-drive
This looks similar to a bug I've encountered when switching from the Tracking Station to a piece of debris "in flight" - it ends up in interstellar space at superluminal velocity xD
